name: ShotEmUp!
description:
A simple and silly shoot-em-up game

Features powerups, cutscenes and of course silly music

It was made for Easter pyjam, but because of my poor ethernet i couldn't upload it at the time

Controls

Arrows - for movement
Space - for shooting, skipping cutscenes

Escape - for exiting to main menu (midgame)

It's my first project so any feedback will be appreciated!

Source code is here
